title: calculated-customer-satisfaction
description: perfromance platform schema for: GOV.UK customer-satisfaction single question plus comment records. Quantitative question rated 1 to 5, 1 being the lowest, 5 being the highest

_id.description: unique url-friendly base64 encoded, utf8 endoded concatenation identifier

_timestamp.description: ISO8601 combined date and time in UTC e.g. '2014-12-01T00:00:00+00:00'

period.description: The period covered by each data point from the _timestamp

satisfaction_score.description: the calculated user satisfaction score for the service

comments.description: the number of respondents leaving a comment - optional dependent on whether information available

total_responses.description: the total number of respondents providing feedback
